name: Boomerang Bunny
description:
Scavenging for food for your family, you get lost in the forest! With your kids all over the place and the fearful encounters of bears, you must find your way back home. But watch out for mama bear, she seemed pretty hungry. 

In terms of accessibility:

-Game is intended for all ages

-Color blind friendly mood

-Subtitles in the sense of subtitles

-Tutorial at the start of the game

-Leporiphobia mode that switches all the bunnies to cats!

Programming -Cody Taylor

Programming- Zane Wolfe

Music- Andrew Ptaszek

Art- Melanie Najera
